titleStmt.title: In fratris sui charissimi G. S. Odas Historicas, PALae-ALBIONIS nomine insignitas, L. C. Carmen.
titleStmt.author: Slatyer, John

publicationStmt.publisher: To the Reader: The English Preface in Print, c. 1475-1640 / Early English Books Online Text Creation Partnership

analytic.title: In fratris sui charissimi G. S. Odas Historicas, PALae-ALBIONIS nomine insignitas, L. C. Carmen.
analytic.author: Slatyer, John

monogr.title: The history of Great Britanie : from the first peopling of this island to this present raigne of or [sic] happy and peacefull monarke K: Iames, by Will: Slatyer
monogr.author: Slatyer, William

div.head: In fratris sui charissimi G. S. Odas Historicas, PALae-ALBIONIS nomine insignitas, L. C. Carmen.
div.l: GEsta antiqua nouis, collata nouissima primis,
Albion haec Odis, cuncta, palaia suis,
Ceu canit, & tenebris Britonum incunabula caecis
Eruit, arrident plus sibi, siqua tibi;
Prisca petis? obscura caue! Noua? Nota; recensens
Quae{que}, placere cupit, nec minus ergo placent.
